Compare.graph_title: Trends in NYC Agency Use: Glyphosate - Parks Liquids 2008 to 2018

info.info_how_calculated: Sum of gallons of liquid pesticide applications made by the Department of Parks and Recreation (Parks) or its contractors that contain the following chemicals: Glyphosate; Glyphosate, isopropylamine salt; Glyphosate, sodium sesqui salt; Glyphosate, monoammonium salt; Glyphosate, ethanolamine salt; Glyphosate, diammonium salt; Glyphosate, dimethylammonium salt; Glyphosate, potassium salt or Glyphosate-trimesium.
info.info_source: Bureau of Environmental Surveillance and Policy (BESP) Combined Analytic Data Set, New York City Pesticide Use Reporting System (NYCPURS)
